attributes.title: Pork Production
attributes.description:
Created on March 28, 2011 by mkc330 on Sourcemap.org:

A map of where the pork sold at Chelsea Market in NYC came from.

attributes.name: Pork Production
attributes.title: Pork Production
attributes.description: A map of where the pork sold at Chelsea Market in NYC came from.

attributes.name: Pig Farm
attributes.title: Pig Farm
attributes.description: Stony Brook Farm: a small pig farm, run by Bob Comis. Here the pigs are raised on a healthy mixture of grain and grass until they are approximately one year old.

attributes.name: Double L Ranch: Slaughter House
attributes.title: Double L Ranch: Slaughter House
attributes.description: Where the pigs are weekly and humanely slaughtered.
